caption.center: DOUGLAS R. INGRAM, Appellant/Cross-Appellee, v. AURELLA A. INGRAM,

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fifth District.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Circuit Court for Brevard County, J. Preston Silvernail, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Elizabeth Siano Harris, of Stadler Harris, P.A., Titusville, for Appellant/Cross-Appellee.
Joe Teague Caruso of Caruso, Swerbilow Camerota, P.A., Merritt Island, for Appellee/ Cross-Appellant.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
SAWAYA, TORPY and JACOBUS, JJ., concur.
NOT FINAL UNTIL THE TIME EXPIRES TO FILE REHEARING MOTION, AND, IF FILED, DISPOSED OF.
